ingredients.ingredient: Â¼ cup A.1. Bold & Spicy Steak Sauce, divided
4 roll whole wheat hamburger buns, split

cookingTips: Mix half the steak sauce into the ground beef before forming patties for deeper flavor
Toast the buns lightly and spread remaining sauce on them before adding patties
Add cheese during the last 30 seconds of cooking and cover to melt evenly
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This is a simple but flavorful burger built on quality beef and bold sauce. Help the user create patties with the right thickness and manage the cooking temperature for a juicy result.
